description: Adaptive lesson plan for Python basics - Variables, Input, Output

goals.title: Variables, Input, and Output
goals.description: Write a simple program that uses variables, takes user input, and prints output.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Learn how to create and use variables with different data types (int, str, float)

lessons.title: Taking User Input
lessons.description: Learn how to get data from users using the input() function

lessons.title: Printing Output
lessons.description: Learn how to display information to users using print()

lessons.title: Review: Combining Variables, Input, and Output
lessons.description: Practice using all three concepts together in one program

lessons.title: Test: Build a Simple Greeting Program
lessons.description: Create a program that takes user input and prints a personalized greeting
